name: Release Update - 9/13/2016
description: This week we've pushed out several patch releases to polyfills, router and validation. You can read the full release notes below.
content:
This week we've pushed out several patch releases to polyfills, router and validation. You can read the full release notes below.

## Release Notes

### [aurelia-polyfills 1.1.1](https://github.com/aurelia/polyfills/compare/1.1.0...v1.1.1) (2016-09-13)

#### Bug Fixes

* **array:** make Array.from work with mapping functions ([c425a49](https://github.com/aurelia/polyfills/commit/c425a49))


### [aurelia-router 1.0.3](https://github.com/aurelia/router/compare/1.0.2...v1.0.3) (2016-09-13)

#### Bug Fixes

* **router:** add navigationStrategy to cloned route config ([dc3a292](https://github.com/aurelia/router/commit/dc3a292))
* **router:** safer execution of custom navigation strategies ([fab2d21](https://github.com/aurelia/router/commit/fab2d21))

### aurelia-validation 0.12.5

#### Bug Fixes

* **ValidationControllerFactory:** construct in child container
* **ValidationParser:** handle "use strict"
